data.text:
John Cleese: ‘Surprising Poverty’ Motivates Him to Continue Working Despite His Age

Residual Effects of Divorce

At 84 years of age, legendary comedian and actor John Cleese has no plans to retire anytime soon. One of the driving forces behind his continued work is the financial impact of his third divorce in 2008 from psychotherapist Alyce Faye Eichelberger. Cleese has described the settlement, which amounted to $20 million (£16 million), as “absurd.”

‘Alimony Tour’ and Financial Struggles

In the aftermath of the divorce, Cleese embarked on a “Alimony Tour” to make up for the lost funds. Despite these efforts, he has stated that he is still experiencing financial difficulties. “I’m surprisingly poor,” Cleese told SagaMagazine. “I never thought it was necessary to own a great deal.”

Underlying Resentment

While Cleese claims to have moved on from the anger of the divorce, he admits that the absurdity of the settlement still motivates him. “How they figured out she was worth $20m, I have no idea,” he commented.

Wealth Distribution and Material Possessions

Despite his estimated net worth of around £20 million, Cleese does not own a car or property. He has transferred the short lease of his flat to his current wife, Jennifer Wade. Cleese’s wealth largely stems from his long-standing involvement with the Monty Python comedy group.

Fawlty Towers Reboot and Controversy

Cleese is currently involved in a revival of the classic BBC comedy series “Fawlty Towers,” in which he played the eccentric hotelier Basil Fawlty. His daughter, Camilla, is co-writing the two-hour stage show. However, the reboot has been met with controversy, as Cleese’s ex-wife, Connie Booth, claims she was not informed about the project.

Perspective on Wealth and Happiness

Cleese’s financial struggles have led him to a philosophical perspective on wealth. “The most important thing is to have enough money to have some really good food, buy clothes twice a year and have nice holidays,” he said.

Conclusion

John Cleese’s continued work despite his age and financial difficulties is a testament to his determination and the lingering impact of his divorce settlement. Through his work, he is able to both express his creative talents and address the financial challenges he faces.
